component.text: Click the computer to see the type of information to gather for planning.

Number and type of hosts - Where are the end users located? What type of hardware are they using? Where are the servers, printers and other network devices located? Applications - What type of applications are running on the network? Data and devices to be shared - Who requires access to which files and network resources such as printers? Bandwidth requirements (speed) - What is an acceptable speed for the end users? Do all users require the same throughput? What affect will the applications have on the throughput? Security - Is the data being moved on the network of a personal or sensitive nature? Could unauthorized access to this information cause harm to anyone? Reliability - How important is the network? Does it need to be available 100% of the time (this is known as uptime)? How much down time can be tolerated? Requirement for wireless - Do any or all of the end users require wireless connectivity?
